int mpi_cmp_abs (  mpi *  X,
mpi *  Y
) 
 

Compare unsigned values.

Returns:
1 if |X| is greater than |Y|, -1 if |X| is lesser than |Y| or 0 if |X| is equal to |Y|

int  z
) 
 

Compare signed values.

Returns:
1 if X is greater than z, -1 if X is lesser than z or 0 if X is equal to z

mpi *  Y
) 
 

Compare signed values.

Returns:
1 if X is greater than Y, -1 if X is lesser than Y or 0 if X is equal to Y

Copy the contents of Y into X.

Returns:

int mpi_div_int (  mpi *  Q,
mpi *  R,
mpi *  A,
int  b
) 
 

Division by int: A = Q * b + R.

Returns:
0 if successful, 1 if memory allocation failed, ERR_MPI_DIVISION_BY_ZERO if b == 0
Note:
Either Q or R can be NULL.

int mpi_div_mpi (  mpi *  Q,
mpi *  R,
mpi *  A,
mpi *  B
) 
 

Division by mpi: A = Q * B + R.

Returns:
0 if successful, 1 if memory allocation failed, ERR_MPI_DIVISION_BY_ZERO if B == 0
Note:
Either Q or R can be NULL.

int mpi_exp_mod (  mpi *  X,
mpi *  A,
mpi *  E,
mpi *  N,
mpi *  _RR
) 
 

Sliding-window exponentiation: X = A^E mod N.

Returns:
0 if successful, 1 if memory allocation failed, ERR_MPI_INVALID_PARAMETER if N is negative or even
Note:
_RR is used to avoid re-computing R*R mod N across multiple calls, which speeds up things a bit. It can be set to NULL if the extra performance is unneeded.

int mpi_export (  mpi *  X,
uchar *  buf,
int *  buflen
) 
 

Export an unsigned value into binary data.

Parameters:
X source mpi
buf output buffer
buflen size of buffer
Returns:
0 if successful, ERR_MPI_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL if buf isn't large enough
Note:
Call this function with *buflen = 0 to obtain the required buffer size in *buflen.

int mpi_gcd (  mpi *  G,
mpi *  A,
mpi *  B
) 
 

Greatest common divisor: G = gcd(A, B).

Returns:
0 if successful, 1 if memory allocation failed

int mpi_gen_prime (  mpi *  X,
int  nbits,
int  dh_flag,
ulong(*)(void *)  rng_fn,
void *  rng_st
) 
 

Prime number generation.

Parameters:
X destination mpi
nbits required size of X in bits
dh_flag set this to 1 if (X-1)/2 must also be prime (needed for Diffie-Hellman)
rng_fn points to the RNG function
rng_st points to the RNG state
Returns:
0 if successful (probably prime), 1 if memory allocation failed, ERR_MPI_INVALID_PARAMETER if nbits is < 3

int  nblimbs

Enlarge X to the specified # of limbs.

Returns:
0 if successful, 1 if memory allocation failed

buf input buffer
buflen size of buffer
Returns:

int mpi_inv_mod (  mpi *  X,
mpi *  A,
mpi *  N
) 
 

Modular inverse: X = A^-1 mod N.

Returns:
0 if successful, 1 if memory allocation failed, ERR_MPI_INVALID_PARAMETER if N is negative or nil ERR_MPI_NOT_INVERTIBLE if A has no inverse mod N

int mpi_is_prime (  mpi *  X  ) 
 

Miller-Rabin primality test.

Returns:
0 if successful (probably prime), 1 if memory allocation failed, ERR_MPI_IS_COMPOSITE if X is not prime

Returns:

char *  s,
int  radix
) 
 

Set value from string.

Parameters:
X destination mpi
s string to read the value from
radix numeric base of "s"
Returns:

mpi *  B
)

Returns:
